title: Glasgow
cityInfo: The city is famous for its architectural styles, with the Glasgow School of Art being the most notable example. Glasgow is a vibrant city with a cosmopolitan vibe. The city is tourist-friendly and offers a great selection of free museums, international restaurants, wonderful architecture and affordable accommodation options..

title: Manchester
cityInfo: It's easily one of the most fun cities to visit in England. It's one of those cities that has a little something for everyone.

title: London
cityInfo: The most popular tourist places in London include the cultural heart of the city, Soho, the green suburbs of Hampstead and the Royal Parks like Richmond Park.
